author: silviodonato
body:
Update of xrootd to 4.0.4 in CMSSW_7_1_X in order to solve the issue with `cmsLHEtoEOSManager` ( https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/prep-ops/7320/1.html ).
The problem was fixed by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31553 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31922 .
However the fix did not work in `CMSSW_7_1_X` (specifically `CMSSW_7_1_32`, used in https://cms-pdmv.cern.ch/mcm/campaigns?prepid=RunIIWinter15pLHE) because of the old version `xrootd`.

This PR updates `xrootd` to 4.0.4 by backporting the relevant commits from `CMSSW_7_5_8_patch7` (corresponding to https://cms-pdmv.cern.ch/mcm/campaigns?prepid=HINPbPbWinter16pLHE)
title: Update xrootd to 4.0.4  (backport 7_1_X)
